name: Manual Overload
description:
Scott's space pod is running out of power. Manual Overload is a first-person button-hell game where you try to replenish your space pod's energy by following the instructions of a sexy computer voice.

A Ludum Dare 39 Game made in less than 48 hours.

Controls:
Mouse  : Move
Left Click : Attempt to press a button
Right Click : Attempt to press a button
W : Reach Up
S : Crouch

Tools:
Unity Plus, Unity Post-Processing Stack, ColorfulFX, FMOD, Maya, Build Report, http://www.fromtexttospeech.com, Scott Thoo
